category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_multisel_actions_list
preference.preference_description: List of available actions to display in the Actions section within the Document tab during a multi-selection. The value(s) of this preference must also be listed in the CATIA_savemanager_actions_list preference to be taken into account. Possible values: main_body_geo : corresponds to "Compute geometry for main body only" option project : corresponds to "Project to assign" option workflow : corresponds to "Workflow to apply" option
